TopicTitle: Velocity Drops to almost nothing when within loading loading distance

Articles.Content:
this happens

i intercepted the one thats falling with the still orbiting one,when I passed the 2.5 km loading distance the game freezes( as it does ) but afterwards the station just shoots down.

i think it might be a conflict with extraplantetary launchpads
ive made some progress, it seams to only happen when crew are aboard
